peersim.bittorrent
Class PeerSetMsg

java.lang.Object
  peersim.bittorrent.SimpleEvent
      peersim.bittorrent.SimpleMsg
          peersim.bittorrent.PeerSetMsg

public class PeerSetMsg
extends SimpleMsg

This class is a SimpleMsg and represents the peerset message used by the tracker to send to the peers a list of neighbors.

PeerSetMsg

public PeerSetMsg(int type,
                  peersim.bittorrent.Neighbor[] array,
                  peersim.core.Node sender)
Initializes a new peerset message.

Parameters:
type - is the type of the message (it should be 12)
array - is the array containing the references to the neighbor nodes
sender - the sender node
